explains: vi. 发生山崩；以压倒优势获胜
wordGroup: landslide victory 以绝对优势取得胜利
landslide control 滑坡控制；滑坡防治

sentences.en: Their house was buried by a landslide.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子被一次山体滑坡掩埋了。

sentences.en: The National League for Democracy pulled off a landslide victory.
sentences.cn: 国家民主联盟取得了压倒性优势的胜利。

sentences.en: A seven-year-old boy was found dead after a landslide engulfed an apartment block.
sentences.cn: 山崩掩埋了一座公寓楼之后，一名7岁的男孩被发现遇难。
